rukus.text: 75|31|Kare wa shinri o ukeirezu, mata reihai mo bō-ge nakatta,
75|32|kaette (Mari) o kyogi to shi, somuki sari,
75|33|omoi agatte kazoku no moto ni omomuita.
75|34|Anata (tashinkyō to) ni wazawai are,(hontōni) wazawai naru ka na.
75|35|Kasanete iu. Anata ni wazawai are,(hontōni) wazawai naru ka na.
75|36|Ningen wa,(mokuteki mo naku) sono mama de hōnin sa reru to omou no ka.
75|37|Motomoto kare wa shashutsu sa reta, itteki no seiekide wa nakatta ka.
75|38|Sore kara hitokatamari no chi to nari, sarani arrā ga,(kinsei ni) katachidzukuri,
75|39|kare wa, ningen o otome no ryōsei ni nasa reta node wa nakatta ka.
75|40|Sore demo kare ni wa, shisha o yomigaera seru o-ryoku ga nai to suru no ka.
